snippet.title: Beware The Ghost - Trailer
snippet.description:
#indiegames #halloween 
Beware The Ghost - A spooky party game played on 2 screens. Up to 4 players explore a haunted house. While another player tries to do them in as an invisible ghost.
Releasing in 2024.
https://tricksygoblin.com/games/bewaretheghost/

Music
"Danse Macabre" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
